usual-mood.question: How would you describe your usual mood ?

options.label: Calm and relaxed
Stressed and frustrated
Mostly bored

mood-swings.question: Do you think your mood changes quickly ?

options.label: No it mostly stays the same
It changes dramatically, I can go from happy to sad like in a minute
It shifts a little, but not dramatically

early-bird-night-own.question: Are you an early bird or night owl ?

options.label: I sleep early and get up early
I can't sleep till late night

most-active-time.question: When do you think you're most active and energetic ?

options.label: I like getting up early in the morning to get my work done
I am more active and energetic during the night

shopping.question: How often do you like to go out for shopping ?

options.label: Almost every week
Maybe once a month
Few times a year
Just for special occasions is enough for me

eat-out.question: How often you like to go out for casual food at restaurants or cafes ?

options.label: I rarely eat out, I prefer home cooked
Almost everyday for lunch or a quick bite
Just on special occasions is enough
Atleast once a month

parties.question: How often do you go out for parties ?

options.label: Rarely or never, I'm not a party person
Just on special occasions
A few times a month
Multiple times a week

keep-thoughts-or-say-out.question: Do you keep your thoughts to yourself or say them out loud ?

options.label: I mostly keep my thoughts to myself
I often share what I'm thinking with my friends and family

hard-to-express-feelings.question: Do you find it hard to express what you're feeling ?

options.label: I am very comfortable sharing my thoughts with others.
I feel like people won't understand what I amd feeling or what I think

hard-to-say-no.question: Do you find it hard to say no to people ?

options.label: I usually find it hard to say no to people
I usually try to help out, but I'll say no if I'm busy
I have no problem saying no if it doesn't fit my priorities

avoids-arguing.question: Do you avoid arguing with people even when you disagree or you're angry ?

options.label: I try to avoid arguments even if I'm upset
I value my opinion and prefer to prove my point
I argue when I feel its necessary

uncomfortable-when-disagree.question: Do you feel sad or uncomfortable when you disagree with someone ?

options.label: Why would I feel uncomfortable if our opinions don't match, everyone has their own choice
I feel bad when I disagree with someone

you-forgive-easily.question: Do you forgive people easily for their mistakes ?

options.label: I forgive people very easily
I can forgive people but it takes some time
I can't forgive people for their mistakes

front-row-or-back.question: In a concert, would you rather ?

options.label: Sit in the front row, close to stage where everyone sees you
Sit in the back row and enjoy the show

free-day.question: How would you prefer to spend a free day ?

options.label: Relaxing at home with a good movie or book
Getting out and exploring outdoors and meeting friends
Diving into a hobby or creative project

tell-or-hide-truth.question: Would you rather tell the truth to your friend or hide it if it makes him sad ?

options.label: I'd be honest and tell the truth, no matter if it hurts him
I'd avoid telling the truth if it hurts him

good-impression.question: Do you worry about making a good impression on people around you ?

options.label: I put efforts to make a positive impression
I focus on being myself rather than caring about my impression
I like people to know the best side of me
Yes, I like competing with others
No, I feel uncomfortable when people are competing with me

future-plans.question: Do you often feel stressed about your future plans ?

options.label: Yes, I care a lot about future and make future plans
No, I prefer to live in the present and enjoy without worrying about the future

decision-making.question: How long do you take to make a decision ?

options.label: I decide things quickly
I need a lot of time to think then I can make a decision

emotions-or-logic.question: Do you think you are emotional ?

options.label: Yes, I go with my heart, I take decisions with my gut feeling
No, I carefully analyze facts and information then take decision

regrets.question: Do you regret your decisions after you take them ?

options.label: Yes
No

aesthetics-or-work.question: How do you like your living and working spaces ?

options.label: I like things organized and clean. I focus on aesthetics
It doesn't matter much if things are not organized. I focus more on work

backup-plans.question: Do you always have a backup plan ?

options.label: Yes, I always have a plan B
No, I focus on the main plan and don't think about alternatives

work-or-rest.question: If you have to work and you are tired ?

options.label: I would finish the work then rest. I can't rest when I have work to do
I would rest then finish my work. I can't work when I'm tired
A night out at a new restaurant
A night at home with takeout food and movie
Serious and committed relations
Casual relations (dating without commitments)
No strings attached kind of relation

important-quality-in-friend.question: What do you think is a most important quality in a friend or partner ?

options.label: Intelligence and presence of mind
Looks and social status
Honesty and trust
Having common interests and values

common-interests-in-relation.question: What do you think how important it is to have common interests in a relation ?

options.label: Very important for building a strong connection
Doesn't matter as long as you both enjoy each other's hobbies
Insult or disrespect
Being Ignored, Feeling unwanted or Lack of communication
Dishonesty, Lying or Cheating

disagree-with-partner.question: If you disagree with your partner or friend, then ?

options.label: If I'm right I will prove my point, no matter if it hurts him
I will try to prove my point but its not more important than his feelings

disagree-on-movie.question: Imagine you and someone you're dating disagree on a movie to watch. How would you handle that ?

options.label: I won't watch the movie with him if he disagrees, I will watch alone
Respect their choice and watch the movie that he wants
Take turns, pick a movie of his choice and next time pick yours

punished-for-mistakes.question: Do you think people should be punished for their mistakes ?

options.label: Yes, It's important people must be punished
People should learn from their mistakes, but punishment is not a good thing
No, People should be forgiven for their mistakes

money-or-time.question: What do you think is important ?

options.label: Money is more important, you can't do anything with time if you have no money
Time is more important, you can't do anything with money if you have no time

people-respect-you.question: Do you think people like and respect you ?

options.label: I don't have any special talent, why would people like or respect me
I think most people like and respect me
Only some close friends like me

hard-life-or-god.question: Do you think everything will be fine in the end ?

options.label: Yes, I believe god will do everything right for me
No, life is hard and you have to work for your dreams

one-year-to-live.question: Imagine you have only one year left to live. what will you do ?

options.label: I will spend that time with my family
I will go out and do what I always wanted to do in my life and fulfill my dreams
I have everything and I'm happy. I will enjoy that last year normally like I do

fame-or-money.question: If you could pick one, which one it would be ?

options.label: Being famous is more important than being rich. I will choose to be famous even if I'm poor.
Being rich is more important than being famous. I will choose to be wealthy even if no one knows me

privacy-or-social-status.question: Do you value your privacy or your social status ?

options.label: I like to have a private life
I like to have a good social status, you should be popular among people, they should know who you are.

dreams-of-me.question: Have you ever seen me in your dreams ?

options.label: Yes, once
Yes, few times
No, never

what-if-someone-likes-you.question: How would you react if you get to know that someone likes you ?

options.label: I'd be offended and its annoying to me
I don't care because I'm not interested in anyone
I'd be happy he felt comfortable telling me that

he-who-sent-you.question: Do you think he who sent this to you likes you ?

options.label: I think he do
I think he don't
